text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Huff... puff... huff... puff...

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Exhale...

text_block_list.name: Student A
text_block_list.text: Huh? Hey, look, it's Taishin.

text_block_list.name: Student B
text_block_list.text: Oh, yeah. Still pint-sized as ever.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Oh, it's you two...

text_block_list.name: Student A
text_block_list.text:
Well, well. Look at that uniform... So<n>you got into Tracen
Academy.

text_block_list.name: Student B
text_block_list.text:
Isn't it a little hard, Taishin? Trying to<n>be a Tracen runner I
mean.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: What?

text_block_list.name: Student B
text_block_list.text:
Seriously, we're no Umamusume, but<n>I bet we could win
against you!

text_block_list.name: Student A
text_block_list.text: Haha, guess we're good enough for<n>Tracen too.

text_block_list.name: Student A
text_block_list.text:
Geez, still making that same sour<n>face. What a loser. Let's
get outta<n>here.

text_block_list.name: Student B
text_block_list.text: Laters. ♪

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Tch!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Taishiiin! We're back! And we<n>brought the goods—TAIYAKI!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Huh? You in a bad mood?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: ...I'm fine.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: It's probably because you took so<n>long shopping, Ticket.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
But Taishin's always like, "I don't<n>care. Get anything."
Between crepes<n>and ice cream, I didn't know what to<n>
choose!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
But look, I got you the super-duper<n>size, so you can get big
and strong!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: S-super-duper?!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
No worries if you can't finish the<n>whole thing—we'll help
out! Let's sit<n>down over there and eat.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Come on, they'll get cold if we don't<n>hurry! Pick up the
pace!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Really... Let's go, Taishin.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Kay.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: All right, one more lap!
Only a few days remain before the<n>Satsuki Sho.

Winning Ticket is entering the final<n>stage of her training.
Today, I'm<n>having her do runs outside the<n>academy.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I'm so full of energy! Let's get this<n>extra training going!
choice_data_list: That's the spirit! Keep it up until the race!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah! All riiight! Time to get fired UP!

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
Ah, it's Winning Ticket and her<n>trainer. I take it you're about
to start<n>training.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Sure are. Why, what's up?

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
Well, you see, a group of reporters<n>have gathered in front of
the academy.

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
I'm thinking of asking them to leave<n>so they don't interfere
with training.<n>There are only a few days left until<n>the
Satsuki Sho, after all.

She's right. With so little time left, we<n>should be getting in as
much training<n>as possible. It'd be best if they left.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Oh, let me talk to them! No way could<n>Iet down any fans or
reporters!

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: Oh? But your training...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
It's fine! I'm not trying to skip it or<n>anything. I'm still gonna
do exactly as<n>we planned!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
So! Looks like I'll be at it until curfew!<n>You'll stick with me
the whole time,<n>right?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hehehe, let's go see those reporters<n>then!

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: Ah! Winning Ticket's here!

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text: Ticket! Are you taking questions?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Whoa! No need to push. I'll answer<n>everyone's questions!

With the Satsuki Sho so close,<n>Winning Ticket is drawing
more<n>attention from the public eye.

Feeling it her duty, she answers all<n>the questions as best
she can.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: Winning Ticket! How's your training<n>coming along?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Um... It's really great! I can tell I'm<n>getting better each day!

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
Are you worried about your two rivals<n>running in the same
race?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
No way! I'm totally excited to race<n>with them! And not just
in the Satsuki<n>Sho, but in the Derby too!

As the gracious racer attends to the<n>swarm of journalists,
Narita Taishin<n>walks out of the academy.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: You look like you're in a jam.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oh, Taishin! Hehe... You know me,<n>couldn't refuse.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
Narita Taishin! Regarding your first<n>race of the Classics, will
you—

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Sorry, I've got training. Later, Ticket.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oh... O-okay.

Narita Taishin dodges the sudden<n>question and briskly
walks away.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: Biwa Hayahide avoided us just<n>before too.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: She did?

I guess Ticket's rivals are too<n>focused on training for the
upcoming<n>Satsuki Sho.

While watching her little press event, I<n>try to think up a new
training regimen<n>so that she doesn't get left behind.

Before we know it, the day of the<n>Satsuki Sho—the first race
of the<n>Classics in which all three members<n>of BNW are
competing—is here.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Uwaaagh! Just hearing "Classic race"<n>is making me
nervous!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Because every Classic is a big deal,<n>not just the Derby.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Because every Classic is a big deal,<n>not just the Derby.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
We've trained hard for this though.<n>You're in tip-top shape.
All that's left<n>is to race up a storm and take the<n>crown!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Taishin and Hayahide will be with me<n>too! So I'll be able to
go all out!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah! I'm ready!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oh, Taishin! Hayahide! HEEEEEY!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Shut up! I told you, the echo in here is<n>crazy!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hehe, I can't help it. I'm so happy to<n>race together!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I understand your enthusiasm.<n>We've been through many
races and<n>are finally standing on the same track.<n>It's
deeply moving.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: I guess... it's kinda cool that all three<n>of us made it here.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: However, running together is not our<n>goal.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
To run and to win... We've given<n>everything for that reason.
It was all to<n>be here, on this day.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Me too. I've wanted nothing more<n>than to make it here. So
I'm gonna<n>race like never before and win this.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah! I don't intend to lose either!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Expectations are high for the favorite<n>racer entering
now—BNW member,<n>Winning Ticket!

Winning Ticket gives a big wave to<n>her fans in the stands
as she heads<n>for the starting gate.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The runners are entering the gate!<n>The first race of the
Classics, the<n>Satsuki Sho... begins!
